snippet: Regulators have approved an additional use of Eliquis to prevent blood clots in the legs and lungs of patients who have had surgery to receive artificial hips or knees.
lead_paragraph: Regulators have approved an additional use of Eliquis to prevent blood clots in the legs and lungs of patients who have had surgery to receive artificial hips or knees.

headline.main: New Use for Clot Inhibitor Eliquis Is Approved
headline.print_headline: New Use For Clot Inhibitor Eliquis Is Approved
